formulas.name: LinkTextFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_CMDT.Link_Text__c}=null, 'Click here to unsubscribe from all email from ' + {!OrganizationNameFINAL} + '.', {!Get_CMDT.Link_Text__c})

formulas.name: screen2part2formula
formulas.expression: IF({!confirmEmailQ}='Yes','You will receive a confirmation email shortly.','')

fields.name: confirmationEmailDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
PREVIEW

The email recipient receives an email.


From: {!OrgWideEmail.value}

Email body: {!ConfirmEmailText}

fields.name: SampleEmailDisplayText_0
fields.fieldText:
PREVIEW

Your email recipient gets an email like this with an unsubscribe link at the bottom.


Dear Friend,


It's Thursday! You love to order a pizza on Thursdays! If you order before 5, I'll also throw in some free drinks!


Your friend,

Bob


{!Get_CMDT.Link_Text__c}

fields.fieldText: {!horizontalLine1}

fields.fieldText: You may modify the text of the link here:

fields.name: SampleEmailDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
PREVIEW

Your email recipient gets an email with an unsubscribe link at the bottom.

{!horizontalLine1}


Dear Friend,


If you order a pizza before 5, I'll also throw in some free drinks!


Your friend,

Bob

fields.name: Screen1PreviewDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
PREVIEW

This page allows the recipient to confirm before opting out. This page is turned off by default.{!horizontalLine1}﻿

To unsubscribe georgeB@bbbl.org {!screen1part2}

fields.name: googlewarning
fields.fieldText:
{!horizontalLine1}

Gmail wants you to make it easier to unsubscribe with "one click" email opt-out so we advise against adding in this page.

fields.fieldText: What is your organization or company name?

value.stringValue: What email address should receive error messages when something goes wrong?

fields.name: confirmEmailQ
fields.fieldText: Do you want to send a confirmation email immediately after the email recipient opts out?

fields.name: ConfirmEmailText
fields.fieldText: What should the email say?

value.stringValue: Enter the organization wide email address that this email will appear to be from.

fields.name: orgwideEmailMoreInfo
fields.fieldText: Here's how to set up an org wide email address.

fields.name: displaySite
fields.fieldText: {!my_domain.Domain.Domain}

fields.name: OneClickdisplaytext
fields.fieldText:
{!horizontalLine1}

The unsubscribe link passes the contact or lead's Salesforce id to a flow. Sometimes an email recipient's security settings block or scramble the ID. You can allow your recipients to type in their email addresses to unsubscribe in that situation. BE CAREFUL! This allows anyone who has the link and knows any email addresses in your database to unsubscribe them. For example, if a bad guy knows that joeschmoe@ymail.com loves your newsletters and that bad guy dislikes your organization, then he could potentially unsubscribe Joe Schmoe from your newsletter!

fields.name: type_in_unsubscribe
fields.fieldText: Allow recipient to type in email

fields.name: GetReadytoPreviewDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
{!horizontalLine1}

Click Preview to see the unsubscribe process from the email recipient's perspective.
